>
[Aasimar's Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1362) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease. Each day, you can cast two 4th-level divine innate spells. You can choose from the following spells each time you cast: [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [_remove disease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=251), and [_neutralize poison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=207).
name: Aasimar's Mercy
